module.value: This is main lynx framework method. It returns angular.Module object based on configuration you provided.

annotate.moduleName: This is an identifier for angular.Module. You may find your application module using angular.module() function with this name provided as parameter.
annotate.pages: Basic configuration of application structure and routing. Each entry contains information on one of application pages and has assigned name, default page path used for routing, and relative url defined in view which points to snippet which should be loaded for given routing path.
annotate.defaultPath: For any url unmatched by Lynx routing, application will be redirected to this path
annotate.wk.lynx.ui: Put every module you need to load here. Modules wk.lynx.core, wk.lynx.velvet and ng are loaded regardless of providing their names here.
